scripts.build: uglifyjs public/js/draw-gmap.js -o public/js/dist/draw-gmap.min.js -c -m --source-map & uglifyjs public/js/draw-ol-map.js public/js/ol-popup.js -o public/js/dist/draw-ol-map.min.js -c -m --source-map & uglifyjs public/js/markerclusterer.js -o public/js/dist/markerclusterer.min.js -c -m --source-map
